About Me

Let me tell you a little about myself and what I do...

Your Project Is In Safe Hands

I am a third year Computer Science student at The Jan Kochanowski University in Kielce. I am intrested in programming and web development for about two years. I spend a lot of time coding and improving my programming skills every day. I am currently working on the project which is based on IGDB video game community website. For the front-end of the project I am using technologies like HTML5, CSS3, JS (EJ6) and for the back-end I am using Spring Framework with Hibernate and MySQL database. I encourage You to look at the photo gallery from the process of creating the project.
